name: Big Brain Simulator
description:
Big Brain Simulator is an exciting adventure, where you take control of a mutated Brain. The Big Brain is trying to escape an evil lab, it will be transplanted to a new host soon, so its decided to break free, during its escape it will face different challenges that it will need to overcome to achieve freedom - hint: look out for Pigeons, they're keen on brains. But careful, the brain loses health outside is host or the controlled Brain Jar, be careful with sudden moves, and look out for blood bags. Keep your brain alive! 

This game was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 46, the teams is formed by 6 students, split equally in 3 coders, and 3 artists. I hope you enjoy our game as much as we enjoyed making it.

The controls are briefly explained in the first level. We support Gamepads as well.

The game was made in Unity all the scripts were made by us, as well as the art assets, including animations and texturing.  The music and sounds used in this game are from royalty free sources.
